title: Oppo Find X5 series goes official with Snapdragon 8 Gen 1, imaging-dedicated MariSilicon X chip
content:
Oppo has today announced its latest flagship smartphone series, the Find X5 and Find X5 Pro. Both phones deliver top-tier specs and a new era of imaging for Oppo; here’s what you need to know.

more…

The post Oppo Find X5 series goes official with Snapdragon 8 Gen 1, imaging-dedicated MariSilicon X chip appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Oppo has officially launched the Find X5 and Find X5 Pro, with the two phones delivering flagship specs and the self-made MariSilicon X chip.
